text:
The "Graphs to Display" settings on the Graph Results listener page (the one 
that appears in the right pane when you have selected a Graph Results listener) 
are not being saved with the test plan. I noticed that other listeners save 
these sorts of settings.
creator: Mark.Brown@macquarie.com.au
woolfel@yahoo.com
text:
additional explanation of the exact problem would be beneficial. I'm not sure I
understand the problem. Is it referring to the setting in the graph? As in,
uncheck some of the items and save the test plan?
